definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode

sentences.english: It's obviously that corrosion-resistance and brightness are much better than those of Zn plating.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，其耐蝕性和光亮度明顯優於鍍鋅層。

sentences.english: The process is fast in deposition speed and excellent in corrosion resistance of the coating.
sentences.chinese: 該工藝沉積速率快，鍍層耐蝕性優異。

sentences.english: Corrosion resistances of nickel alloys in tidal zone are better than in fully immersion zone.
sentences.chinese: 鎳合金在潮汐區的耐蝕性比全浸區好。

sentences.english: Phosphating process has usually been adopted to improve the corrosion resistance of iron and steel.
sentences.chinese: 磷化處理常用於提高鋼鐵件的耐蝕性。

sentences.english: Zinc plating chromic acid salt after the passivation, corrosion resistance can improve 6 to 8 times.
sentences.chinese: 鋅鍍層經鉻酸鹽鈍化之後，耐蝕性可提高6～8倍。

sentences.english: The influence of rustproof pigments on the corrosion protective properties of the film was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了防鏽顏料對塗層耐蝕性的影響。

sentences.english: The results show the different film structure of polyaniline coating has the obvious difference in corrosion behavior.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，不同的聚苯胺表面膜耐蝕能力有顯著區別。

sentences.english: Al and Rare Earth in bath can improve the corrosion resistance of coating.
sentences.chinese: 鋅池中的鋁和稀土可以提高鍍層的耐蝕性。

sentences.english: The method comprises providing the substrate with a wear protection layer and providing corrosion resistant layer.
sentences.chinese: 該方法包括向基材提供耐磨層和耐蝕層。

sentences.english: Chemical immersion indicated that PKS has better corrosion-resistant properties.
sentences.chinese: 由浸漬實驗測試，證明PKS具有良好的耐蝕性能。

sentences.english: The corrosion resistance and the fatigue resistance of the aluminium coating film are exa- mined.
sentences.chinese: 測定了鋁膜耐蝕性及疲勞性能。

sentences.english: Magnesium alloys have poor corrosion resistance and cause environmental pollution as they are chemically conversed by chromate.
sentences.chinese: 鎂合金的耐蝕性差，用鉻酸鹽法處理污染環境。

sentences.english: Graining Technology by Electrolytic Etching on the Surface of Aluminum Alloys.
sentences.chinese: 電鍍防護性鋅基合金鍍層鈍化膜的耐蝕性。

sentences.english: The corrosion resistance of the coating is measured by neutral salt spray test and soaking in 5%NaCl solution.
sentences.chinese: 塗層的耐蝕性採用中性鹽霧試驗和5%鹽水浸潤試驗。

sentences.english: The spring is made in stainless steel, with strong corrosion resistance.
sentences.chinese: 彈簧是用不鏽鋼製作，因而具有很強的耐蝕性。

sentences.english: Ridges occur in humid regions along belts of resistant rocks.
sentences.chinese: 在潮溼地區，山脊沿着耐蝕的石帶發育。
